entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add Unescaping and Transcoding to JsonMarshal #108571
  • Switch Default CI Focus to osx-arm64 for CoreCLR PRs #108570
  • dotnet.assembly.count Shouldn't Be An UpDown Counter? #108566

Closed

  • Intermittent issue while fetching windows default credentials using UseDefaultCredentials = true in HttpClientHandler #107480
  • [API Proposal]: ConcurrentDictionary.Clear(bool noResize) #107016
    10.0.0
  • Fuzzing workflow is not friendly to rebuild and incremental changes. #107204
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Optimize Memmove unrolling for constant src #108576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add static factory for InvalidEnumArgumentException #108574
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Avoid `OverflowException` in `Boolean.TryFormat` #108572
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • LINQ GroupBy Grouping can use InlineArray for first elements to avoid allocations #108569
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Move more helpers from DomainAssembly to Assembly #108568
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Use architecture independent code paths in Array #108449
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Stored the initial capacity of the ConcurrentDictionary for correctly sizing the backing array after clearing the collection. #108065
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Update fuzzing infra to build and use the shared framework #108555
    area-Meta
  • Use the managed implementation of extendedKeyUsage codec everywhere #108558
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0

Updated

  • [wasm] Fixes for issue #108519 #108543
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] JIT: Null out SSA def nodes upon removal in RBO #108548
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] linux/arm64: Verify TLS resolver code #108564
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix an issue with the last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors #108492
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix vector class retrieval and type checks for binary operand APIs #107388
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono, 10.0.0
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108535
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Allow un-examining in PipeReader.AdvanceTo(...) #107360
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Call native BrotliEncoderMaxCompressedSize method for BrotliEncoder.GetMaxCompressedLength #108043
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add fuzzer for Convert.To/FromBase64 APIs #108247
    area-System.Runtime
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • [release/9.0] Fix IL2104 link #108533
    Servicing-consider, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Hot reload does not work on Linux when the project name has a period (.NET 9 RC1) #43861
    9.0.1xx

Updated

  • error MSB3231: Unable to remove directory #42963
  • Track signature errors #42870
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]With NET9 RC2 SDK installed, some strings are unlocalized in output of "dotnet workload --info". #43533
  • How to seamlessly swap NuGet packages with source? #7334
    Backlog
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Windows.Forms, Version=9.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089' in .Net9-rc1 #43593
  • Cannot update workload manifests from authenticated AzDO feeds on macOS #35912

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2553196 #43920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix baseline manifest version for RTM branding #43737
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix extension comparison #43877
    Area-Watch

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Symbols not published for 4.11.0 #75407
  • Can't move type to file due to `MoveTypeCodeRefactoringProvider` error #75405

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding (#64928)" #75406
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations from creating MissingTokenWithTrivia objects #75404
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix some more unnecessary NFW reporting #75403
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Report LSP loading telemetry #75402
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Mark ISourceGenerator as obsolete for implementation #75223
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update insertion model after VS snap #75295
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Added "propr" snippet for required properties #75339
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP: Support modifiers with simple lambda parameters. #75400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #58255
  • Perf regression: caching #58254
  • Perf improvement: updates #58253
  • Perf regression: fortunes #58249
  • Perf regression: json, json, plainTextSansFilter #58248

Closed

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct, ApiCrudDeleteProduct #58250
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes, plaintext #58227
  • Perf improvement: caching, json #58247
  • OpenApi Should support OpenAPI 3.1 AND thus OneOf for Enums AND Generics. #58239
  • ExcludeFromDescriptionAttribute not excluding controller actions from OpenAPI document #57425
    9.0.0
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #58121
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, json, json #58216
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #58236

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix for: Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #58251
    community-contribution, area-minimal

Updated

  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #56114 #58218
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • Add additional ProblemDetails default types and titles #58101
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • Add source generator to emit public Program class definition #58199
    area-infrastructure, area-minimal
  • Fix handling for ambient route parameters #58246
    area-mvc, feature-openapi
  • Use ImpersonationToken for IIS Windows Auth #58041
    feature-iis, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix Prefix Matching Logic in PrefixContainer #58068
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Unable to find the default constructor on type Microsoft.Maui.Platform.NavigationRootManager+ElementBasedFragment #25106
  • Consider allowing primary window definition via the MAUI startup overloaded method as `UseMauiApp<TApp, TWindow>()` #25101
  • Remove excessive DataTemplateSelector Comments #25100
  • Workload installation failed: Workload manifest microsoft.net.sdk.ios: 17.5.8030/8.0.100 from workload version 8.0.402.0 was not installed. Running "dotnet workload repair" may resolve this. #25099

Closed

  • The type or name space 'ContentPage' could not be found #25103

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove excessive DataTemplateSelector API comments #25105
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • [Android] Input transparent for a content page #25104
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar

Updated

  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • Batch CollectionChanged events #20036
    legacy-area-perf, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf
  • Nested Flex Layouts #25036
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, layout-flex
  • Move TitleViewSetOnShellWorksAfterNavigation to Appium #25094
  • WIP: HybridWebView: Invoke .NET methods from JavaScript #25077
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
